description: CGI is a professional services provider company helping customers to support or build applications.
Working on conversion of legacy TMS (Transport Management Shipment) application, build on using Java, Swing, JSP, JSF into web based application utilizing Angular Framework.

Worked on developing MVP product for Canadian Onvio Customers.  Heavily involved in developing Angular 4 Application and AEM components for new Marketing Web pages which are going to get release by December.

Sales Express is an internal Project of AT&T to create a platform between the merchants and the AT&T.  Sales Express displays all the products and services offered by the AT&T, the project has two sections billings and support.  Role is to create UI pages consists of the tables and the forms to show all case details and comments of a case numbers generated based on the login credentials entered
